title: Jean Geraghty
deck:
I am Jean and am married to Billy, and we lead a Lifegroup together. I am also involved in working with the younger children on Sundays in the Explorers group. I work full time as an Independent Financial Adviser.

We have lived in York since 2008 and came here when we moved back to live in the UK after living in the States. Our son and daughter in law had been part of Gateway when they lived on the RAF base at Linton and they love coming to visit us as they get a chance to catch up with friends here, as well as us.
